#summary How to Help the Tunnelblick Project
#sidebar wSb

There are several ways to help the Tunnelblick project:
  * Try [wBeta beta versions] (when available) of Tunnelblick and help find problems.
  * Help translate Tunnelblick to other languages. No special programs are required -- you only need the !TextEdit program that comes with all Macs. Contact [http://code.google.com/u/jkbullard/ Jon].
  * Report bugs or problems in the [http://groups.google.com/group/tunnelblick-discuss Tunnelblick Discussion Group].
  * Help other Tunnelblick users in the [http://groups.google.com/group/tunnelblick-discuss Tunnelblick Discussion Group].
  * Make suggestions for new features.

------------------

===PLEASE USE THE [http://groups.google.com/group/tunnelblick-discuss TUNNELBLICK DISCUSSION GROUP] FOR COMMENTS OR QUESTIONS*===
